scripts.db:reload:dev: ts-node -r tsconfig-paths/register ./node_modules/typeorm/cli.js schema:drop -d src/infra/database/datasource.ts && ts-node -r tsconfig-paths/register ./node_modules/typeorm/cli.js schema:sync -d src/infra/database/datasource.ts && npm run fixtures:load
scripts.db:reload:test: NODE_ENV=test ts-node -r tsconfig-paths/register ./node_modules/typeorm/cli.js schema:drop -d src/infra/database/datasource.ts && NODE_ENV=test ts-node -r tsconfig-paths/register ./node_modules/typeorm/cli.js schema:sync -d src/infra/database/datasource.ts && npm run fixtures:load:test
scripts.fixtures:load: npx fixtures load test/helper/fixtures -d src/infra/database/datasource.ts --require ts-node/register --require tsconfig-paths/register --sync
scripts.fixtures:load:dev: NODE_ENV=development npx fixtures load test/helper/fixtures -d src/infra/database/datasource.ts --require ts-node/register --require tsconfig-paths/register --sync
scripts.fixtures:load:test: NODE_ENV=test npx fixtures load test/helper/fixtures -d src/infra/database/datasource.ts --require ts-node/register --require tsconfig-paths/register --sync
scripts.fixtures:reset: npm run db:reload:dev && npm run fixtures:load
scripts.fixtures:reset:dev: npm run db:reload:dev && npm run fixtures:load:dev
scripts.fixtures:reset:test: npm run db:reload:test && npm run fixtures:load:test
